+ Menu Format

++ Bold - [Ctrl-B]
Mark the text currently selected in the WikiTextEditor with appropriate markup for *bold* text.

++ Italic - [Ctrl-I]
Mark the text currently selected in the WikiTextEditor with appropriate markup for _italics_.

++ Heading - [Ctrl-Alt-H]
Mark the current line (containing the text cursor) with markup for a heading.

Use this multiple times in order to increase the level of the heading.

----

++ Rewrap Text - [Ctrl-W]
Rewraps text (adds/removes newlines) to make each line contain no more characters as defined in "wrap" attribute. See [TextFormatting].

++ Convert
+++ Selection to Link - [Ctrl-J]
Convert text selected in the WikiTextEditor to a wiki link, also removing forbidden characters.

+++ Selection to WikiWord - [Ctrl-Shift-R]
Move selected text to another WikiWord and place a link to this WikiWord where the text was.

You are asked for the link to the word. If you enter an existing WikiWord you are asked if you want to append the text to this WikiPage.

----

++ Icon Name
Insert the name of the selected icon at the cursor position.

++ Color Name
Insert the name of the selected color at the cursor position.

++ Add Attribute
Allows to append to a WikiPage the appropriate attribute in order to give the related node in tree the selected icon or color.
